name: AmikoHome
0:
”Alexa, set lights to red”
”Alexa, set Bedroom lights to 20 percent”
”Alexa, turn on Living Room lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your Amiko Home smarthome devices with Alexa.

Follow these steps to setup Alexa with Amiko Home:
- Download Amiko Home app to your mobile from stores.
- Register and account and login
- Add your gateway to your account through the app by scanning QR code.
- Pair the hub with your lights, switches and outlets as described in the manuals.
- Download Alexa app to your mobile and configure your Echo in the app
- Enable the "Amiko Home" in smart home skills, it will as for your login details to authenticate.
- Discover the devices in the app
- You are done, enjoy the voice control
